author: Team Latestly
title: 'Love You, Papa': Esha Deol Remembers Dharmendra While Ringing In New Year 2026 in Dubai; Bobby Deol Reacts (View Post)
text:
Actor Esha Deol rang in the New Year 2026 in Dubai, marking the occasion with a personal tribute to her late father, veteran actor Dharmendra. The actor shared moments from her celebrations on Instagram late Wednesday, choosing a reflective tone amid the festivities. ‘Happy Birthday to My Queen’: Esha Deol Pens Heartfelt Birthday Note for ‘Mamma’ Hema Malini, Calls Her the ‘Dream Girl of the Nation’ As Veteran Actress Turns 77 (View Post)
Esha Deol Shares Post on Instagram - See Post
